docs.title: Furretar's site
docs.text: This is where I document and explain some stuff that I do.

docs.title: Mandarin Dubs
docs.text:
I upload Mandarin dubs of anime at https://nyaa.si/user/Furretar

I'm at an intermediate level of Mandarin, with like 6k anki cards. I'd love to talk to anyone learning mandarin (or Japanese), so feel free to message me anytime.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
To contact me, you can use my Discord ID (preferred): furretar

or my email: wyattpetrock@gmail.com

docs.title: Info
docs.text:
I extract and OCR a lot of hard subtitles from Chinese content. Here is the tool I made to help with this, along with a tutorial: https://github.com/Furretar/Hardsub-Extract-OCR.

All of the subtitles I make are saved at: https://github.com/Furretar/Mandarin-Subtitles-Archive.

There is some more information, and another collection of mandarin dubs at Refold's Mandarin Chinese Anime Donghua Cartoons Index.

docs.title: Mandarin Dub Missing Content
docs.text: Please contact me if you would like to help source this content.

docs.title: Netflix (For Better Quality)
docs.text:
• Hunter x Hunter
  • Chainsaw Man
  • JoJo no kimyou na bouken

docs.title: iQiYi (Tutorial For Downloading)
docs.text:
• Slam Dunk Mainland Dub
  • Slam Dunk Movie Mainland Dub

docs.title: Antoc (Requires Aliyun Drive)
docs.text:
• K-ON Season 1
  • Cowboy Bebop
  • Kimi no suizou wo tabetai, other ver
  • One Piece

docs.title: Known Issues
docs.text:
Please contact me if you find any other issues with a torrent I've uploaded.

  • Taiwan CHT subs for Demon Slayer S04E04 are a repeat of the subs for S04E03
  • Jojo s1e18 desyncs
  • Blue lock s1 subs should be traditional
